data.title: Latest news, views, pictures, video
data.meta_description: Cheryl is a solo music artist and shares a son with former One Direction member, Liam Payne.
data.text:
Cheryl is a solo music artist and shares a son with former One Direction member, Liam Payne.

She shot to fame in the girl band Girls Aloud and was formally married to Ashley Cole before divorcing him in 2012. In March 2017, Cheryl and Liam Payne welcomed their baby son, Bear but the couple announced their split in 2018. She is also currently appearing as a judge on the new BBC show, The Greatest Dancer.
